name: vectorscript.vim
description: This is a syntax file for the VectorScript/MiniCad/Minipascal language.  I developed it specifically for VectorWorks 10.  The syntax file does seem to work for minicad 6.0 I have not tried it in anything below that but I'm sure it will work.
install_details: Place this file in your /usr/syntax folder.  Should be placed in all vim packages in the syntax folder.
